## ConnectedComponent type

A connected component that can be instantiated with route context

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ConnectedComponent<TConfig extends AdapterConfig> = (routeContext: RouteContext<TConfig>) => RefSpec<TConfig['baseElement']>;
```
**References:** [AdapterConfig](../../view/adapterconfig/)<!-- -->, [RouteContext](../routecontext/)<!-- -->, [RefSpec](../../view/refspec/)
